SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.input

Class ActionMap<A extends Enum<A>>

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.input.ActionMap<A>
Type Parameters:
A - enum type representing high-level actions
public class ActionMap<A extends Enum<A>> extends Object
Maps high-level enum actions to one or more Triggers.

This lets gameplay/UI code ask questions like "is JUMP pressed?" without caring which key/mouse button caused it.

Also supports per-tick "consumption" so one system (ex: UI) can claim an action press/release and prevent other systems (ex: gameplay) from responding in the same tick.

Usage pattern:

  • Bind triggers in GameApp.bindInputs(...).
  • Call update() once per engine update tick to clear consumption.
  • Query with isDown(Enum), isPressed(Enum), isReleased(Enum).
  • Optionally consume with consumePressed(Enum) / consumeReleased(Enum).

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionMap

      public ActionMap(Class<A> actionEnumClass, InputManager input)
      Creates an ActionMap for the given action enum type.
      Parameters:
      actionEnumClass - enum class token (used to initialize EnumMap/EnumSet)
      input - input manager queried by triggers

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Call once per update tick to clear per-tick consumption. Must be called every tick or consumption will persist.

    • bind

      public void bind(A action, Trigger trigger)
      Binds a trigger to an action. Multiple triggers per action are allowed.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to bind
      trigger - the trigger that can activate the action

    • unbindAll

      public void unbindAll(A action)
      Removes all triggers bound to an action and clears any consumption flags for it.
      Parameters:
      action - action to unbind

    • isDown

      public boolean isDown(A action)
      Returns true while any trigger bound to the action is currently held.
      Parameters:
      action - action to query
      Returns:
      true if down

    • isPressed

      public boolean isPressed(A action)
      Returns true only on the tick the action was pressed, unless consumed.
      Parameters:
      action - action to query
      Returns:
      true if pressed this tick and not consumed

    • isReleased

      public boolean isReleased(A action)
      Returns true only on the tick the action was released, unless consumed.
      Parameters:
      action - action to query
      Returns:
      true if released this tick and not consumed

    • consumePressed

      public void consumePressed(A action)
      Prevents other systems from seeing this action as "pressed" for the rest of the tick. Typical use: UI consumes confirm/cancel so gameplay doesn't also react.
      Parameters:
      action - action to consume

    • consumeReleased

      public void consumeReleased(A action)
      Prevents other systems from seeing this action as "released" for the rest of the tick.
      Parameters:
      action - action to consume

    • consume

      public void consume(A action)
      Convenience: consumes both pressed and released for this tick.
      Parameters:
      action - action to consume

    • isPressedConsumed

      public boolean isPressedConsumed(A action)
      Parameters:
      action - action to query
      Returns:
      true if pressed state has been consumed this tick

    • isReleasedConsumed

      public boolean isReleasedConsumed(A action)
      Parameters:
      action - action to query
      Returns:
      true if released state has been consumed this tick
